ComicInfo.Title: Want You To Want Me: Part 4: You Have the Right Not To Be Killed
ComicInfo.Summary: Cyclops thought he knew how volatile, unpredictable and ultimately destructive Deadpool could be. That's why, rather than allowing him to enter Utopia, he instead assigned Domino to monitor the would-be X-Man's actions in San Francisco -- keep him close, but at a safe distance. But with Deadpool, there's no such thing as a 'safe distance'...and Cyclops is about to find out that Deadpool has a plan to do something so heinous that it could destroy all of Utopia!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:12:00. [CVDB186800]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Jody LeHeup, Joe Quesada
ComicInfo.Characters: Colossus, Cyclops, Deadpool, Domino, Mark Kincaid, Norman Osborn, Surge, Wolverine
